library(agricolae)

# Modelo com transforma√ß√£o sqrt

# Box-Cox autom√°tico

lambda

[1] 0.4242424

# Aplicando transforma√ß√£o

  mutate(count2 = (count^lambda - 1) / lambda,

# Novo modelo

plot(m1)

library(agricolae)

insects <- InsectSprays

# Modelo com transforma√ß√£o sqrt
m1 <- lm(sqrt(count) ~ spray, data = insects)
plot(m1)




























# Box-Cox autom√°tico
b <- boxcox(lm(count + 0.1 ~ 1, data = insects))







lambda <- b$x[which.max(b$y)]
lambda

[1] 0.4242424

# Aplicando transforma√ß√£o
insects <- insects |>
  mutate(count2 = (count^lambda - 1) / lambda,
         count3 = sqrt(count))

hist(insects$count)







# Novo modelo
m1 <- lm(count2 ~ spray, data = insects)
plot(m1)
